channel.title: sex on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in sex on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: How to encourage mutual respect between men and women in India
item.description: INTRODUCTION The gang-rape and death of Jyothi Singh Pandey who was previously known in the media as Damini or Nirbhaya, was the tipping point in bringing to focus a long suffered issue of disrespect and violence towards women in India.

item.title: Fire 1996: Exploring Lesbianism in the controversial contexts of Feminism, Religion and Sexuality
item.description: This bold movie tells the story of two women who are married to brothers in a joint family. Through shared loneliness, they soon start a secret affair within the household.

item.title: Dialogues III
item.description: Dear readers, I’ve finally started to shed my inertia and write properly again. Here is the next set of Dialogues we had. J: Just to clarify, was it the Old Testament which said the earth was flat?

item.title: Dialogues II
item.description: S: In response to your questions: What is relativism? Itâ€™s the philosophical position that all points of view are equally valid and that all truth is relative to the individual.
